amendment.description: To make available funds for the Reading for the Blind and Dyslexic program of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4518 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4518 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6358-6359) To make available funds for the Reading for the Blind and Dyslexic program of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4518 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4518 proposed by Senator Warner.
